results.title: Cardioprotective effect of metformin/donepezil combination in HFD/STZ-induced diabetic male Wistar rats involves acetylcholinesterase inhibition and modulation of Bax/Bcl-2/caspase 3 pathway.
results.text_hl: Also, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Donepezil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077265 @@@donepezil@@@ reduced the damage caused by @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ to the heart, including high levels of injury markers, @DISEASE_Soft_Tissue_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D017695 @@@tissue damage@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_AA_amyloidosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000718787 @@@amyloid@@@ buildup.

citations.NLM: Saka WA, Olamoyegun MA, Ashonibare VJ, Ashonibare PJ, Oladipo AA, Adegbola CA, Kolawole OR, Adeyeni AE, Akinkunmi OA, Adebayo J, Akhigbe TM, Akhigbe RE. Cardioprotective effect of metformin/donepezil combination in HFD/STZ-induced diabetic male Wistar rats involves acetylcholinesterase inhibition and modulation of Bax/Bcl-2/caspase 3 pathway. results.title: Hybrid Lipoplex Boosts Neuron-Microglia Crosstalk for Treatment of Alzheimer's Disease through Abeta-Targeted-Autophagy and ApoE2 Gene Supplementation.
results.text_hl: Herein, @CHEMICAL_Guanidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019791 @@@guanidine@@@-rich @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipids@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-inspired MLS and @CHEMICAL_Arginine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001120 @@@arginine@@@-contained RLS) are devised to trigger selective chaperone-mediated autophagy for @<m>DISEASE_AA_amyloidosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000718787 @@@amyloid@@@ precursor protein degradation in neurons.

citations.NLM: Pu Y, Dai XL, Wang Y, Chen Y, Wu C, Zhou X, Chen M, Chen YH, Shuai X, Jin R, Nie Y. Hybrid Lipoplex Boosts Neuron-Microglia Crosstalk for Treatment of Alzheimer's Disease through Abeta-Targeted-Autophagy and ApoE2 Gene Supplementation. Adv Mater. 2025 Apr 29;():e2418560. results.title: Breaking the vicious cycle: bitter compounds targeting metabolic defects and inflammation in Alzheimer's disease.
results.text_hl: Preclinical studies have demonstrated their ability to suppress @DISEASE_Neuroinflammatory_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D000090862 @@@neuroinflammation@@@, restore @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ sensitivity, and mitigate @<m>DISEASE_AA_amyloidosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000718787 @@@amyloid@@@/@GENE_MAPT @GENE_4137 @@@tau@@@ pathology, potentially disrupting the metabolic-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ cycle.

citations.NLM: Wu H, He L, Dai L. Breaking the vicious cycle: bitter compounds targeting metabolic defects and inflammation in Alzheimer's disease. Am J Physiol Endocrinol Metab. 2025 Aug 1;329(2):E266-E275. PMID: 40622910

results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and its @CHEMICAL_Sulfonamides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013449 @@@sulphonamide@@@ derivative simultaneously potentiateanti-@GENE_BCHE @GENE_590 @@@cholinesterase@@@ activity of @CHEMICAL_Donepezil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077265 @@@donepezil@@@ and inhibit @<m>DISEASE_AA_amyloidosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000718787 @@@beta-amyloid aggregation@@@
